summary: Alduin's power source in one spell book.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod adds a spell that gives you the power of Alduin, in your left hand. It will look like normal fireball but when it hits the enemy, big rocks will pop out from it, like popcorn. Some enemies will knock up a little bit duo to rocks. You can get the book atÂ Temple of Kynareth. My ENB bugged after running Loot somehow so I didn't take screenshots that much.
[/size][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Install[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Automatically with NMM or manually dragging the esp to your data folder.[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Q&A[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]Q:[/size][size=3] What happened to your ENB?
[/size][size=5]A:[/size] [size=3]No idea man. I wanted to run loot for the first time in my life and ENB lost effects. Changing parameters no longer working, water doesn't change. I'm afraid I'm gonna have to re install Skyrim and load order is actually correct, I've no idea why it suddenly happened. It actually happened back then, after a while it fixed by itself, donno.[/size][/font]
author: ProtologolusX
